channel.title: Presentations on { George_Vlahavas }
channel.description: Recent content in Presentations on { George_Vlahavas }

item.title: Presentations
item.description: This is a list of presentations and talks I’ve given in workshops and seminars. Most of the videos are here because somebody else decided it was a good idea to record them! So, thank you!

item.title: The Linux Command Line seminars @ GreekLUG (in Greek)
item.description: This is a series of seminars I presented at GreekLUG, about the use of the Linux Command Line. Youtube Playlist (in Greek)

item.title: Salix presentation @ GreekLUG (in Greek)
item.description: This is a presentation of Salix, the GNU/Linux distribution I am developing. The presentation was make in GreekLUG, Thessaloniki, Greece, so it is in Greek. It’s quite a lengthy one I must admit. Youtube Video (in Greek) Slides
